titleStmt.title: Of the horrible and wofull destruction of, Sodome, and Gomorra To the tune of the nine Muses.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richard Iohnes for Henrie Kyrkham, dwelling at the signe of the blacke Boy: at the middle north dore of Paules church,

notesStmt.note: Printed in double columns, separated by woodcut ornaments.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the blacke Boy: at the middle north dore of Paules church
